content:
So I'm still observing irreproducible segfaults from time to time in rustc -- at all stages (stage0, stage1, and stage2). I'm keeping a log of the backtraces as they occur here for now.

https://gist.github.com/nikomatsakis/92827cb5ff853d0c5b46313da512241a
They seem to mostly (but not exclusively) occur in LLVM-related code.
Do you have LLVM assertions enabledâ€¦ (actually might not be that helpful if it is not reliably reproducible)
hmm, I do not, but I can do so
usually I just run x.py again and things work fine
Could run memtest overnight to rule out memory-related shenanigans
